info.description: API to create, update and manage the product definition details, interest conditions, repayment calculator, simulate a loan contract and project the schedules
info.title: Product Builder

get.summary: Retrieves the details of all the products based on a given Product line and Product group
get.description: Retrieves the details of all the products based on a given Product line and Product group

parameters.name: productLineId
parameters.description: The top level product line, which the product is ultimately attached to. May be a Temenos-defined product line such as ACCOUNTS, AGENT, BUNDLE, CONSENT, DEPOSITS, LENDING, REWARDS, etc. or one defined by the institution to manage external products.

parameters.name: productGroupId
parameters.description: The group, as defined by the institution, that the product belongs to.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from Transact on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: Identifier of the lead company of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch for the respective contract for customer data protection purposes. Example US0010001.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

parameters.name: disablePagination
parameters.description: Indicates the pagination header attributes availability. If set to 'true', it fetches all the data

get.summary: Retrieves the Repayment Details for the given Product, Principal amount and Term
get.description: Retrieves the Repayment Details for the given Product, Principal amount and Term

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: Contains the unique identifier of the product, e.g. the product id of the arrangement account.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: This is the payment amount

parameters.name: term
parameters.description: Indicates the period to which the BID and OFFER rates apply

parameters.name: currencyId
parameters.description: Identifier of the currency. This is the 3-letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

parameters.name: paymentFrequency
parameters.description: The frequency at which a payment is required to be generated

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from Transact on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: Identifier of the lead company of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch for the respective contract for customer data protection purposes. Example US0010001.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

parameters.name: disablePagination
parameters.description: Indicates the pagination header attributes availability. If set to 'true', it fetches all the data

parameters.description: Contains the unique identifier of the product, e.g. the product id of the arrangement account.

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: Identifier of the lead company of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch for the respective contract for customer data protection purposes. Example US0010001.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

productLine.description: The top level product line, which the product is ultimately attached to. May be a Temenos-defined product line such as ACCOUNTS, AGENT, BUNDLE, CONSENT, DEPOSITS, LENDING, REWARDS, etc. or one defined by the institution to manage external products.

displayName.description: Contains the name used for display or enrichment purposes

displayNames.description: Contains the name used for display or enrichment purposes

displayName.description: Contains the name used for display or enrichment purposes

propertyClassId.description: The identifier of a condition that is used to build a product

propertyClassName.description: The name of the condition that is used to build a product

ccySpecific.description: Identifies the fees applicable for a transaction

currency.description: Identifies the currency. E.g. USD, GBP etc

creditInterest.description: It is the Interest property which is the part of the Product. It represent the Positive interest accrued for an account.

creditInterestType.description: Indicates the type of calculation selected for credit interest. Types such as Single, Level and Band are available

creditInterestMinimumBalance.description: The minimum tier balance allocated for the credit interest property. This will belong to Level/Band type of properties.

creditInterestMaximumBalance.description: The maximum tier balance allocated for the credit interest property. This will belong to Level/Band type of properties.

creditInterestMarginRate.description: A margin rate can be used to adjust the specified rate of interest and to appropriately reflect the effective rate given for a property.

debitInterest.description: It is the Interest property which is the part of the Product. It represents the interest accrued for an account.

debitInterestType.description: Indicates the type of calculation selected for debit interest. Types such as Single, Level and Band are available

debitInterestMinimumBalance.description: The minimum tier balance allocated for the debit interest property. This will belong to Level/Band type of properties.

debitInterestMaximumBalance.description: The maximum tier balance allocated for the debit interest property. This will belong to Level/Band type of properties.

debitInterestMarginRate.description: A margin rate can be used to adjust the specified rate of interest and to appropriately reflect the effective rate given for a property.

overdraftAmount.description: Represents the Overdrafted amount to an account.

noticePeriod.description: The period for which the funds will be available once notice has been given.

term.description: Indicates the period to which the BID and OFFER rates apply

minimumTerm.description: Refers to the minimum term associated with the loan process.

maximumTerm.description: Refers to the maximum term associated with the loan process.

periodicIndex.description: Denotes an index which points to the right period of the securities or holdings.

creditInterestTierAmount.description: The maximum monetary amount that can be specified for the tier. Applicable for Level/Band Types

creditInterestTierPercentage.description: Applicable tier percentage (between 0 and 100) for credit interest calculations based on amount specified in Term Amount. Term Amount - The monetary amount applied to the account.

creditInterestRate.description: The Effective rate of an interest property applied on an account.

debitInterestTierAmount.description: The minimum monetary amount that can be specified for the tier. In Level/Band Type of Interest.

debitInterestTierPercentage.description: Applicable tier percentage (between 0 and 100) for debit interest calculations based on amount specified in Term Amount. Term Amount - The monetary amount applied to the account.

debitInterestRate.description: The Effective rate of an interest property applied on an account.

fee.description: The charge or fee collected for an account.

feeAmount.description: Indicates the fee amount which is applied for the payment instruction

feeFrequency.description: The frequency/schedule on which the fee is collected.

serviceAvailability.description: It will indicate whether the corresponding service is available for arrangement account

defaultOption.description: Indicates whether the option will be selected by default if no instruction is provided by the account owner

customerOptions.description: It will indicate whether user has opted the service or not.

productId.description: Contains the unique identifier of the product, e.g. the product id of the arrangement account.

productGroupId.description: The group, as defined by the institution, that the product belongs to.

productLine.description: The top level product line, which the product is ultimately attached to. May be a Temenos-defined product line such as ACCOUNTS, AGENT, BUNDLE, CONSENT, DEPOSITS, LENDING, REWARDS, etc. or one defined by the institution to manage external products.

productDescription.description: Indicates the description of the Product

productLineDisplayName.description: Indicates the display name of product line

productGroupDisplayName.description: Indicates the display name of product group

productCoCode.description: Indicates the company code of product

availableFromDate.description: The date the product is available in the catalogue for sale to customers

availableToDate.description: Indicates the expiry date of the catalogued product

interestConditionId.description: The identifier of the product condition used to define the interest rate

displayName.description: Contains the name used for display or enrichment purposes

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

uniqueIdentifier.description: The unique identifier/Message Reference of the record created.

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

fixedRate.description: Numeric value for the interest rate entered manually.

floatingRate.description: The interest rate is chosen from a selection of values which represent different interest types and rates.

linkedRateIndicator.description: The interest rate for the tier can be linked to that of another account, YES/NO indicator

customRateIndicator.description: A custom rate can be calculated and applied to an account, flag set to Yes for this to be invoked otherwise No.

minimumTierRate.description: A minimum interest rate can be applied at each tier.

maximumTierRate.description: The maximum rate that can be applied at each tier.

tierAmount.description: The monetary amount for the tier.

tierNegativeRate.description: A negative interest rate can be applied at each tier, select Yes, No, Block margin

tierPercent.description: Applicable tier percentage (between 0 and 100) for interest calculations based on amount bands

marginType.description: Defines whether there are single or multiple margins to be considered while arriving at the applicable interest rate  Allowed values:  null (default): multiple margins may be defined SINGLE: only a single margin is allowed

marginOperand.description: This is the operand which determines if a  margin is added or subtracted from the interest rate.  Options are ADD or SUB.

marginRate.description: This is the rate applied over the default interest rate or commission rate to achieve the actual rate.

displayNames.description: Contains the name used for display or enrichment purposes

displayName.description: Contains the name used for display or enrichment purposes

rateTierType.description: Different interest rates can be applied for tiers determined by monetary amounts.  Standard selection to choose from - Single, Level, Banded

linkedArrangement.description: The account which is linked for calculating interest that should be applied to this account

defaultNegotiable.description: Indicates the field values are negotiable or not at arrangement level

code.description: The code related to override message.

options.description: The usable options for the override.

description.description: Contains the description of purpose of the payment.

fullDescription.description: Contains the detailed description of the condition or rule definition

errorMessage.description: Contains the description of the error.

featureClassTypes.description: Indicates the what are the supporting characteristicts of property class. For example, CCY - These type of feature classess supports currency(FC.InterestRates), OPT.CCY - These are currency optional feature classess(FC.PeriodicCharges, FC.ActivityCharges), NO.CCY - These are non currency feature classess(FC.PackageProducts,FC.Eligibility)

featureClassType.description: Indicates the what are the supporting characteristicts of property class. For example, CCY - These type of feature classess supports currency(FC.InterestRates), OPT.CCY - These are currency optional feature classess(FC.PeriodicCharges, FC.ActivityCharges), NO.CCY - These are non currency feature classess(FC.PackageProducts,FC.Eligibility)

productLines.description: The top level product line, which the product is ultimately attached to. May be a Temenos-defined product line such as ACCOUNTS, AGENT, BUNDLE, CONSENT, DEPOSITS, LENDING, REWARDS, etc. or one defined by the institution to manage external products.

productLine.description: The top level product line, which the product is ultimately attached to. May be a Temenos-defined product line such as ACCOUNTS, AGENT, BUNDLE, CONSENT, DEPOSITS, LENDING, REWARDS, etc. or one defined by the institution to manage external products.

mandatory.description: Indicates whether the feature is mandatory or not

featureId.description: Indicates the virtual business feature id which contains one or more functional conditions. Basically, it is an instance of Feature class. For example,the features of FC.ActivityCharges are  F.ActivityCharges,F.CashBack and features of FC.PeriodicCharges are F.PeriodicCharges,F.PeriodicCashBack,F.PackagePeriodicCharges, F.PackagePeriodicCashBack

featureName.description: Indicates the name/ description of Feature .For example, Activity Charges, Periodic Charges,Cash Back,Interest rates

featureClassId.description: Indicates the virtual business feature class id which contains one or more functional conditions. For example, FC.ActivityCharges, FC.PeriodicCharges,FC.InterestRates.  The feature class FC.ActivityCharges, the end user configures a single set of parameters (i.e. a feature condition) and the definition will deconstruct the parameters into the constituent Fees, Activity Charges and Activity Restriction product conditions.

featureClassName.description: Indicates the name/ description of Feature class. For example, Activity Charges Feature Class, Periodic Charges Feature Class, Interest feature Class

ccySpecific.description: Defines the charges collected for a transaction

currency.description: Identifies the currency. E.g. USD, GBP etc

overdraftAmount.description: Represents the Overdrafted amount to an account.

noticePeriod.description: The period for which the funds will be available once notice has been given.

term.description: Indicates the period to which the BID and OFFER rates apply

minimumTerm.description: Refers to the minimum term associated with the loan process.

maximumTerm.description: Refers to the maximum term associated with the loan process.

availableToDate.description: Indicates the expiry date of the catalogued product

reportingId.description: Identifier of the Reporting component. Id component consists of Product/Arrangement Id,Property,Currency(Optional),Effective date

scheduleId.description: Identifier of the Schedule component. Id component consists of Product/Arrangement Id,Property,Currency,Period,Variation,Effective date

paymentTypes.description: Indicates if the payment is Customer (C) type or Bank (B) type

paymentMethod.description: Method chosen to make the payment

paymentFrequency.description: The frequency at which a payment is required to be generated

startDate.description: Contains the date on which the transaction or payment gets initiated.

endDate.description: Indicates the date till which the transaction history requested. If 20120101 is the start date and 20120201 is the end date, all transactions that are booked between January 1 to February 1 2012 are returned

interestId.description: Identifier of the Interest component. Id component consists of Product/Arrangement Id,Property,Currency,Period,Variation,Effective date

interestDayBasis.description: Defines the method of calculation for accrued interest on a Security

description.description: Contains the description of purpose of the payment.

fixedRate.description: Numeric value for the interest rate entered manually.

floatingIndex.description: Indicates the type of interest which is tied to a variable base rate

periodicIndex.description: Denotes an index which points to the right period of the securities or holdings.

periodicType.description: Indicates the period used to fetch interest rate from the Periodic Interest definition

periodicMethod.description: Indicates the method used to calculate the interest rate for period interest setup

periodicReset.description: Indicates the reset period of the periodic index defined

marginRate.description: This is the rate applied over the default interest rate or commission rate to achieve the actual rate.

marginOperand.description: This is the operand which determines if a  margin is added or subtracted from the interest rate.  Options are ADD or SUB.

tierAmount.description: The monetary amount for the tier.

interestType.description: Indicates the type of Interest component attached to a Product. Options are Debit/Credit

compoundType.description: Contains the frequency type of compound in loan. For example, annually or monthly.

compoundYieldMethod.description: Indicates how the effective rate is calculated, when set to YIELD the interest rate defined is taken as the annual effective rate

chargeId.description: This indicates the charge code which will be triggered for payment stop instruction. Applicable when financial institutions would like to charge for stop payment of cheque etc.

chargeType.description: Indicates the charge types which are applicable for the transaction. Example: CORRBKCHG

fixedAmount.description: Indicates the monetary amount that is fixed during the associated account's effective period

tierType.description: Type of the tier rate. Allowed values: - BAND: rates apply within each band - LEVEL: a common rate applies, determined by the highest level

calcType.description: Denotes the type of calculation selected for the Interest/Charge component

chargeRate.description: Indicates the rate applied to the Charge component

chargeAmount.description: Retrieves the Charge Amount after redeem

tierMinCharge.description: Indicates the minimum monetary amount that can be specified for the tier. Applies for Charge with Level/Band Types

tierMaxCharge.description: Indicates the maximum monetary amount that can be specified for the tier. Applies for Charge with Level/Band Types

chargeTierAmount.description: Indicates the monetary amount that can be specified for the tier. Applies for Charge with Level/Band Types

feeType.description: Indicates the type of fee which is applied for payment instruction

chargeCurrency.description: Indicates the currency code of the charge account from where the fee is deducted

aprType.description: Indicates the type of Annual Percentage Rate calculation selected for Reporting. Available options such as Cashflow,Interest

excludeProperty.description: Indicates the list of properties excluded for Annual Percentage Rate calculation

serviceAvailability.description: It will indicate whether the corresponding service is available for arrangement account

defaultOption.description: Indicates whether the option will be selected by default if no instruction is provided by the account owner

customerOptions.description: It will indicate whether user has opted the service or not.

productId.description: Contains the unique identifier of the product, e.g. the product id of the arrangement account.

productGroupId.description: The group, as defined by the institution, that the product belongs to.

productLine.description: The top level product line, which the product is ultimately attached to. May be a Temenos-defined product line such as ACCOUNTS, AGENT, BUNDLE, CONSENT, DEPOSITS, LENDING, REWARDS, etc. or one defined by the institution to manage external products.

productDescription.description: Indicates the description of the Product

productLineDisplayName.description: Indicates the display name of product line

productGroupDisplayName.description: Indicates the display name of product group

productCoCode.description: Indicates the company code of product

availableFromDate.description: The date the product is available in the catalogue for sale to customers

printOption.description: Flag to indicate whether Printing option is applicable to an account

displayName.description: Contains the name used for display or enrichment purposes

action.description: Refers to view or cancel options.

availableDate.description: Specifies the date after which the contract or amount is available for use.

processMethod.description: Suggesting the processing method actions Proof/Publish

displayName.description: Contains the name used for display or enrichment purposes

action.description: Refers to view or cancel options.

availableDate.description: Specifies the date after which the contract or amount is available for use.

processMethod.description: Suggesting the processing method actions Proof/Publish

interestConditionId.description: The identifier of the product condition used to define the interest rate

displayName.description: Contains the name used for display or enrichment purposes
